SELECT code_group_id, code, code_name FROM common_code WHERE code_group_id = 'location'
AND ( (#{location} REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' AND parent_code_id = #{location}) OR (#{location} NOT REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' AND code_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{location}, '%')) )
and 1 = 1

SELECT r.recruit_subject , c.code_name as 'rec_status' , r.app_count , r.post_create_at , r.end_date FROM recruit r JOIN common_code c ON r.rec_status = c.code;
